EXTRACTED VALUE: GRID is the type of game that straddles the line between sim and arcade so well that it actually works on both levels.
A clear improvement over the current-gen version, and the definitive Burnout Revenge experience. Still not quite up to Takedown's greatness, though.
With its many accessible difficulty options and forgiving career mode, PGR4 manages to be a very fun arcade racer.
While you'll find that the repetitive environments and strange puzzle sections are turn-offs, there's still a fine game here in Devil May Cry 4.
Regardless of some small faults, when it gets down to it, if you're at all into skateboarding, you simply have to play Skate.
If [you] live and breathe online gaming, GRAW 2 is undoubtedly a must-buy.
In the end, Burnout Paradise is as close to paradise as you're going to get.
